tooltip:
魔法蜂箱 (#2226)
燃烧时间: 300
Effective production chance as a percent is
2.8 * b^0.52 * (p + t)^0.52 * s^0.37
where b is the base production chance as a percent,
p is the production modifier (additive, starts at -0.1 for the magic apiary),
t is 1 for the magic apiary, and
s is the speed value for the bee
Outputs are generated at the end of every bee tick (27.5 seconds)
Primary outputs are rolled once with base chance, once with half
When boosted, base p becomes 0.8, Mutation: 2x, Lifespan: 0.5x
